Name: IIS AppPool - Update Recycle Settings
Description: Update the worker process and app pool timeout/recycle times.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
Import-Module WebAdministration

$applicationPoolName = $OctopusParameters["ApplicationPoolName"]
$idleTimeout = $OctopusParameters["IdleTimeoutMinutes"]
$periodicRestart = $OctopusParameters["RegularTimeIntervalMinutes"]
$periodicRecycleTime = $OctopusParameters["PeriodicRecycleTime"]

function Update-IISAppPool-RecyclingTimeoutSettings($name, $idleTimeout, $periodicRestart) {
    Write-Output "Setting worker precess idle timeout to $idleTimeout and periodic restart time to $periodicRestart for AppPool $name."
    $Pool = Get-Item IIS:\AppPools\"$name"
    $Pool.ProcessModel.IdleTimeout = [TimeSpan]::FromMinutes($idleTimeout)
    $Pool.Recycling.PeriodicRestart.Time = [TimeSpan]::FromMinutes($periodicRestart)
    $Pool | Set-Item
}

function Update-IISAppPool-RecyclingPeriodicSetting($name, $value) {
    Write-Output "Setting periodic recycle for AppPool $name to $value."
    Clear-ItemProperty IIS:\AppPools\"$name" -Name Recycling.periodicRestart.schedule # Clear any existing schedules
    Set-ItemProperty IIS:\AppPools\"$name" -Name Recycling.periodicRestart.schedule -Value @{value=$value}
}

Update-IISAppPool-RecyclingTimeoutSettings -Name $applicationPoolName -IdleTimeout $idleTimeout -PeriodicRestart $periodicRestart
Update-IISAppPool-RecyclingPeriodicSetting -Name $applicationPoolName -Value $periodicRecycleTime

Parameters.Name: ApplicationPoolName
Parameters.Label: Application pool
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the application pool to modify. The application pool must already exist.

Parameters.Name: IdleTimeoutMinutes
Parameters.Label: Process idle timeout
Parameters.HelpText: Amount of time (in minutes) a worker process will remain idle before it shuts down. A value of 0 means the process does not shut down after an idle timeout.

Parameters.Name: RegularTimeIntervalMinutes
Parameters.Label: Application pool recycle time interval
Parameters.HelpText: Period of time (in minutes) after which the application pool will recycle. A value of 0 means the application pool does not recycle on a regular interval.

Parameters.Name: PeriodicRecycleTime
Parameters.Label: Application pool periodic recycle time
Parameters.HelpText:
A specific local time, in 24 hour format, when the application pool is recycled.

Example: "00:30:00" for half an hour past midnight.
